person.persName: John West Hazelrigg (Mount Sterling, Kentucky, lawyer)

body.p: Mount Sterling, Kentucky, lawyer. Kentucky native. Merchant in Morgan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in 1850. Lawyer in Morgan County in 1860. Owned nineteen enslaved persons in 1860. Lawyer in Mount Sterling, Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1863.
